profile.profileDescription: Custom profile configuration for Denver Public Art

label.name_singular: Restoration of the site to its original condition including the removal of any waste materials and its debris to the satisfaction of the city Project Manger and/or Site Manager
label.name_plural: Restoration of the site to its original condition including the removal of any waste materials and its debris to the satisfaction of the city Project Manger and/or Site Manager

label.name_singular: Installation of the identification plaque for the work according to City specifications
label.name_plural: Installation of the identification plaque for the work according to City specifications

label.name_singular: Submission of all required images and film documentation
label.name_plural: Submission of all required images and film documentation

label.name_singular: Register of Copyright and submission of the completed artwork
label.name_plural: Register of Copyright and submission of the completed artwork

label.name_singular: Lien Releases *Submission of all required lien releases
label.name_plural: Lien Releases *Submission of all required lien releases

label.name_singular: Maintenance and Preservation of artworks to include instructions, material and recommendations
label.name_plural: Maintenance and Preservation of artworks to include instructions, material and recommendations

label.name_singular: Installation of the completed work approved in writing by the City
label.name_plural: Installation of the completed work approved in writing by the City

label.name: Height
label.description: Height of object; enter in your preferred units (eg. 10cm)

label.name: Width
label.description: Width of object; enter in your preferred units (eg. 10cm)

label.name: Length
label.description: Length of object; enter in your preferred units (eg. 10cm)

label.name: Diameter
label.description: Diameter of object; enter in your preferred units (eg. 10cm)

label.name: Weight
label.description: Weight of object; enter in your preferred units

label.name: Rights
label.description: Information about rights held in and over the work.

label.name: Rights Holder
label.description: To identify the person or organization holding or managing the rights related to the work.

label.name: Copyright Statement
label.description: Use to state copyright statements over the artwork.

label.name: Georeference
label.description: Coordinates documenting the location of the work.

label.name: Date selection panel approved by DCCA
Preliminary design approved and paid date
Final design approved and paid date
Final walk thru paid and date
Accession documents (Deed of gift, thank you letter)
